name: StoreHours
description: Redirect users to what specific departments they want to know the hours for.

sampleUtterances.utterance: I want to know the working hours of the store
What are the hours in which the store is open?
What hours are you guys open?
At what time do you guys close?
What is the usual weeday schedule?

plainTextMessage.value: That's okay. If you would like to know about the hours of our service or collision departments simply ask away!
Would you like information about the hours of our sales department?
Our sales department is open from Monday to Saturday between 9 am to 8 pm PDT and Sunday between 10 am to 7 pm PDT.
